node.detail_zh: 患者住在灣仔駱克道 356 - 362 號鴻福大廈。在 1 月 26 日（農曆年初二）曾與多名親友（合共 19 人）在觀塘永興工業大廈一間派對房間參與聚會，該處有一個露台，他們在露台燒烤及打邊爐。在場包括 2 名從中國廣東省來港的親友，兩人均在 1 月底離開香港。及後男患者與其他家人均有肺炎徵狀。男患者在律敦治醫院接受治療。在過去 14 日沒有外遊紀錄。患者於 2 月 16 日出院。
node.detail_en: The patient lives in Hung Fook Mansion, 356-362 Lockhart Road, Wanchai. On Jan 26, the patient had a get-together with family members/relatives, totaling 19 people. The group met in a party room in Kwun Tong where they had barbecue and hotpot on a balcony. Two of those present at the gathering were from Guangdong Province, China and left Hong Kong in late Jan.  The patient and some of his family members have shown symptoms of pneumonia. He received treatment at Ruttonjee Hospital. He had not travelled outside Hong Kong in the previous 14 days. He was discharged on Feb 16.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 「打邊爐家族」疑因為在 2020 年 1 月 26 日（農曆年初二）於觀塘一 party room 舉行家族聚會，包括在室外平台燒烤及打邊爐，聚會共有 19 人出席，包括 2 名來自中國廣東省的親戚。
groups.description_en: The "hotpot family" cluster is a group of 19 family members who joined a family gathering at a party room in Kwun Tong on Jan 26, 2020 (2nd day of Chinese New Year), where they had BBQ and hotpot. 2 of the participants had travelled from Guangdong.

node.location_zh: 華懋交易廣場 2 期大廈 6 樓及 25 樓
駱克道 356-362 號鴻福大廈
node.remarks_zh: 1 月 30 日出現發燒和咳嗽
node.remarks_en: Developed fever and cough since Jan 30

node.location_zh: 永興工業大廈 Lento Party Room
node.location_en: Lento Party Room, Wing Hing Industrial Building
